org.apache.ignite.internal.util

Class GridSynchronizedMap<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<K,V>
        • org.apache.ignite.internal.util.GridSynchronizedMap<K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable, ConcurrentMap<K,V>, Map<K,V>

    public class GridSynchronizedMap<K,V>
extends ConcurrentHashMap<K,V>
implements Externalizable
    Synchronized map for cache values that is safe to update in-place. Main reason for this map is to provide snapshot-guarantee for serialization and keep concurrent iterators.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
